shortdesc.ph: Adjusts the playback signal volume of a specified remote user.

p.codeblock: public abstract int adjustUserPlaybackSignalVolume(int uid, int volume);
virtual int adjustUserPlaybackSignalVolume(unsigned int uid, int volume) = 0;
abstract adjustUserPlaybackSignalVolume(uid: number, volume: number): number;
public abstract int AdjustUserPlaybackSignalVolume(uint uid, int volume);
abstract adjustUserPlaybackSignalVolume(uid: number, volume: number): number;
Future<void> adjustUserPlaybackSignalVolume( {required int uid, required int volume});

section.title: Details
section.p: You can call this method to adjust the playback volume of a specified remote user. To adjust the playback volume of different remote users, call the method as many times, once for each remote user.

ul.li: Call this method after joining a channel.
The playback volume here refers to the mixed volume of a specified remote user.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.
